mapper.select: select p.id, p.id_cate, c.name as 'cateName', p.id_brand, b.name as 'brandName', p.name, p.sn, p.shorttitle as 'shortTitle', p.subtitle as 'subTitle', p.entitle as 'enTitle', p.rome, p.jianpin as 'jianPin', p.keywords as 'keyWords', p.path_img, p.descr, p.isshow as 'isShow', p.isonsale as 'isOnSale', p.isshipping as 'isShipping', p.onoroffsaletime as 'onOrOffSaleTime', p.sort, p.status, p.createdate as 'createDate', p.lastdate as 'lastDate' from product p, category c,brand b where p.id = #{value} and p.id_cate = c.id and p.id_brand = b.id
select id, id_pro, id_cateattr as 'id_cateAttr', id_attr, attrvalue as 'attrValue', sort, status, createdate as 'createDate', lastdate as 'lastDate' from productattr where id_pro = #{value}
select id, id_pro, path_img, sort, status, createdate, lastdate from productimage where id_pro = #{value} order by sort asc

select id, id_pro, provider, descr, feature, proshow, areaintroduce, qualification, usemethod, brandculture, honor, providerintroduce, status, createdate, lastdate from productinfo where id_pro = #{value}
select id, id_pro, markprice as 'markPrice', shopprice as 'shopPrice', activeprice as 'activePrice', status, createdate, lastdate from productprice where id_pro = #{value}

select id, id_pro, id_user, username as 'userName', score, content, isreply as 'isReply', status, createdate as 'createDate', lastdate as 'lastDate' from product p where id_pro = #{id_pro} and status = 1 order createdate desc
limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from comment where id_pro = #{value} and status = 1

select count(*) from cousult where id_pro = #{id_pro} and status = 1
and type = #{type}

SELECT t.id AS paid, b.id AS baid, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.name) AS name, CASE WHEN b.showtype != '0' THEN GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT v.value) ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t.attrvalue) END AS value, CASE WHEN b.showtype != '0' THEN GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT v.id) ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (CONCAT('-',t.id,''))) END AS vid FROM productattr t,cateattri c,basicattri b,basicattrivalue v WHERE t.id_pro = #{value} AND t.id_cateattr = c.id AND c.id_attr = b.id AND CASE WHEN b.showtype = '3' THEN CONCAT(',',v.id,',') REGEXP CONCAT(',(',REPLACE(SUBSTRING(t.attrvalue,2,LENGTH(t.attrvalue)-2),',','|'),'),') WHEN b.showtype = '1' OR b.showtype = '2' THEN v.id = t.id_attr ELSE t.id_attr IS NULL END GROUP BY t.id,b.id ORDER BY c.sort

SELECT b.id AS baid, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.name) AS NAME, b.showtype AS TYPE, CASE WHEN b.showtype != '0' THEN GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT v.value) ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t.attrvalue) END AS VALUE, CASE WHEN b.showtype != '0' THEN GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT v.id) ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT (CONCAT('-',t.id,''))) END AS vid FROM productattr t,cateattri c,basicattri b,basicattrivalue v,category ct WHERE ct.id = #{value} AND c.id_cate = ct.id AND t.id_cateattr = c.id AND c.id_attr = b.id AND CASE WHEN b.showtype = '3' THEN CONCAT(',',v.id,',') REGEXP CONCAT(',(',REPLACE(SUBSTRING(t.attrvalue,2,LENGTH(t.attrvalue)-2),',','|'),'),') WHEN b.showtype = '1' OR b.showtype = '2' THEN v.id = t.id_attr ELSE t.id_attr IS NULL END GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY c.sort
